title: Elise voice bug?
body:
((ahhh my original post was removed from the wrong forum SORRYSORRY))

The last few times I've played Elise, I've noticed that her voice doesn't change when she goes into spider form; her taunts, her laugh, it's all the same as human!elise... now I know I haven't played her for a while before these past couple of days, so I was wondering if this was my game being weird or if this was a change implemented when I wasn't looking?

If it was a change, I'm a little disappointed haha. Her laugh in spider form (paired with the animation) was super adorable :c

{{item:3151}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3151}}

replies.body:
Hey Nightla - 

Thanks for the report! We're looking into what's going on with her VO. Definitely not intended, haha.

It's not just you, everybody is having this issue since 6.2 went live. 

Hope riot fixes this very soon, I want my creepy evil spider voice back.
